relevant_findings.general: Sitting up in bed, alert but looking withdrawn, minimal movement and paucity of facial expressions.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Sclera anicteric, conjunctivae pink. Mucous membranes moist. Oropharyngeal mucosa normal in appearance, without inflammation, exudates, or lesions.
relevant_findings.neck: Supple. No anterior cervical, submental, submandibular, or supraclavicular lymphadenopathy appreciated.
relevant_findings.thorax_and_lungs: Breathing comfortably on room air, no retractions. Lungs clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes/rhonchi/rales.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1/S2, no murmurs/rubs/gallops. No jugular venous distention appreciated.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Distended and diffusely tender, with involuntary guarding and rebound. Hypoactive to absent bowel sounds. No masses or organomegaly.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well-perfused, with 2+ radial and dorsalis pedis pulses. No edema appreciated.
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert, attentive, cooperative with exam, good recall of and coherent history. Cranial nerves II-XII intact. No focal weakness, abnormal sensation, or discoordination.
